mapper.update: CREATE TABLE `${tableName}` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `card` varchar(30) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '群昵称', `nickname` varchar(30) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'qq昵称', `message_id` varchar(30) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `group_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `self_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `content` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci, `time` datetime, `deleted` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `message_type` varchar(12) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index_content` (`content`(767)), KEY `t_chat_record_time_IDX` (`time`) USING BTREE, KEY `t_chat_record_group_id_IDX` (`group_id`) USING BTREE, KEY `t_chat_record_user_id_IDX` (`user_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='群聊历史聊天表';

CREATE TABLE `${tableName}` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `regex` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `reply` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `deleted` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `is_text` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否为文本消息 若1(true)，则取reply字段直接发送文本回复', `relative_path` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '优先 相对路径 父级目录为：程序目录/replyCustom', `cq_type` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `url` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `group_ids` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '为空：群聊情况下 所有群可触发', `message_type` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '为空：群聊私聊都可触发', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='自定义回复表';

CREATE TABLE `${tableName}` ( `id` bigint(20) auto_increment NOT NULL, `user_id` BIGINT NOT NULL, `group_id` BIGINT NOT NULL, `self_id` BIGINT NOT NULL, `key_word` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `answer` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='词条表(群自定义回复)';

CREATE TABLE `${tableName}` ( `id` bigint(20) auto_increment NOT NULL, `pid` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `width` INT NULL, `height` INT NULL, `view` INT NULL, `bookmarks` INT NULL, `img_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `img_p` varchar(100) NULL, `uid` varchar(30) NULL, `author` varchar(100) NULL, `is_r18` bit NOT NULL, `tags` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index_tags` (`tags`(767)) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='pixiv图库（定时爬虫下载,需要在配置文件开启该爬虫）';

CREATE TABLE `${tableName}` ( `id` bigint(20) auto_increment NOT NULL, `user_id` BIGINT NOT NULL, `self_id` BIGINT NOT NULL, `send_time` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `times` INT NOT NULL, `message_type` varchar(12), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='点赞记录表';

CREATE TABLE `${tableName}` ( `id` bigint(20) auto_increment NOT NULL, `key` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `content` varchar(2048) NOT NULL, `create_time` TIMESTAMP NULL, `modify_time` TIMESTAMP NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='字典表';
